ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] A run of luck
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow!~  Grats to Crier!! We went to PoH Friday night.  Drop rate really bad for us.  No bard stuff. Around 5.30 am we dispelled everyone and were in the process
ygData.messageBody:
Wow!~ Grats to Crier!!

We went to PoH Friday night. Drop rate really bad for us. No bard stuff.
Around 5.30 am we dispelled everyone and were in the process of rebuffing in
some special buff order we use when Uncle Innie broke loose from his "stuck
in the wall" spot and patrolled his area. He got very "agro-vated" at us
and attacked us before we knew what was up. Soon, we found out what was up
because we were all thrown "up" into the air. I landed on a roof top and
had to track back to my party. Others were thrown thru the ceiling and
landed in "the room with no exit." Extended CorpseRecovery began. Several
theorys were discussed on how we could get the folks out of the room with no
exit but before we could agree on which to try first, a guide/gm showed up
and got our folks out.

Earlier last week, I left the very last pick-up group I will ever do. I
swear! There were 3 guildies and 3 outsiders - we were camping the
StoneSpider room. One was a druid nobody really knew. After I camped for
the night, he left a fight to chase the guano harvester. He killed it and
told the group "I am keeping the loot because I solo'd it." He was however
happy enough to be in and win a random on the Brown Chitin Protector that
dropped off the SS earlier. Yes they booted him and took his name for their
"never again" lists. Just hearing this tale put me over the edge. Never
again.

Anyhow, yes still 48 - grrr. Too many dragon and plane raids (Crier, I know
exactly what you mean). And not enough blue spectres. I guess those days
are past.

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bardette of 48 songs
... somewhere on Innoruuk
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly

> > - Belt of Concordance
> > - Lyssa's Darkwood Piccolo

if
